allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - CIS Microsoft 365 Foundations Benchmark v2.3.2

Complete PowerShell module for auditing Microsoft 365 environments against CIS Benchmark v5.0.0.

Features:
- 130 automated compliance checks across 9 sections
- Connect-CISBenchmark function for easy authentication
- Auto-detection of tenant information
- HTML and CSV report generation
- PowerShell 5.1 and 7+ compatibility
EOF
)")
